attributes.action: Tighten the laws regarding animal cruelty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We call for the penalties given to those found guilty of acts of cruelty towards animals of all kinds to be more severe.

We find it insulting that the maximum custodial sentence is 6 Months.

Those found guilty of murdering animals should face similar charges given to those who commit human murder.

The level of respect shown to animals by Gordon Browns government is pitiful and it is about time something was done to change this.
